subject: OFFICE OF THE SENATE PRESIDE
body:
OFFICE OF THE SENATE PRESIDENT
          FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA. 
 
Attn: 
 
Thanks for your message once again.
 
We are looking forward to receive a copy of your drivers license or international passport is urgently required for identification to enable us proceed without delay as time is not on our side.
 
Yours sincerely,
Senator GodsWill Akpabio ( Senate President)
Federal Republic Of Nigeria.

subject: Re:   OFFICE OF THE SENATE PRESIDE
body:
Hello Senator Akpabio,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your prompt reply. However, I have a few concerns regarding the request for my driver's license or passport. Could you please provide me with more information about why this is necessary? I want to ensure that I understand the purpose and importance of providing such personal documents.

Additionally, could you clarify what exactly the process will be after I submit these documents? Will there be any fees or charges involved? It would be helpful to have a clear understanding of what to expect moving forward.

Thank you once again for your time and assistance.

Best wishes,
Cole

subject: OFFICE OF THE SENATE PRESIDENT
body:
OFFICE OF THE SENATE PRESIDENT 
 FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA.  
 
 Dear Sir, 
 
 It is imperative that you forward your personal details including a copy of yourÂ  drivers license for recognition and representation of your payment file to avoid false claim and to also ensure that we are dealing with the real beneficiary of the funds. 
 
 You are not required to pay any fees to receive your over due payment. My office will monitor and supervise all foreign Payments to ensure transparency and accountability. 
 
We will expect to receive your personal details in your next reply for further hearing. 
 
 Yours sincerely, 
Senator GodsWill Akpabio ( Senate President) 
Federal Republic Of Nigeria. Tel: + 234 913 589 6176.

subject: Re: OFFICE OF THE SENATE PRESIDENT
body:
Dear Senator Akpabio,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern about false claims and ensuring that we are dealing with the real funds. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding further.

Could you please provide more information about the overdue payment? What is the nature of this payment and why is it being made to me specifically? Additionally, could you explain how my personal details, including a copy of my driver's license, are necessary for this process?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Cole
